languages.text: При вашем приближении в теле сервитора начинает что-то гудеть, словно реагируя на ваше присутствие. Через пару секунд шум стихает.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] При вашем приближении сервоприводы начинают гудеть чуть сильнее, будто сервитор оценивает кто к нему подходит. Через несколько секунд шум стихает

languages.text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.
languages.original_text: При вашем приближении в теле сервитора начинает что-то гудеть, словно реагируя на ваше присутствие. Через пару секунд шум стихает.

traits.locale_text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.
As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.
As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.

languages.text: Als du dich näherst, beginnt etwas im Körper des Servitors zu summen, wie als Reaktion auf deine Anwesenheit. Nach einigen Sekunden verstummt das Geräusch wieder.
languages.original_text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.

traits.locale_text: Als du dich näherst, beginnt etwas im Körper des Servitors zu summen, wie als Reaktion auf deine Anwesenheit. Nach einigen Sekunden verstummt das Geräusch wieder.

languages.text: Lorsque vous vous approchez du servitor, quelque chose dans son corps se met à vrombir, comme en réaction à votre présence. Au bout de quelques secondes, le bourdonnement s'arrête.
languages.original_text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque vous vous approchez du servitor, quelque chose dans son corps se met à vrombir, comme en réaction à votre présence. Au bout de quelques secondes, le bourdonnement s'arrête.

languages.text: 当你靠近时，这位机仆身体中的某种东西发出了嗡嗡声，似乎是在回应你的存在。几秒钟后，嗡嗡声又消失了。
languages.original_text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.

traits.locale_text: 当你靠近时，这位奴工身体中的某种东西发出了嗡嗡声，似乎是在回应你的存在。几秒钟后，嗡嗡声又消失了。

languages.text: 近づくと、あなたの存在に反応するように、サーヴィターの体の何かが音を立てはじめる。その音は数秒後に鳴りやんだ。
languages.original_text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.

traits.locale_text: 近づくと、あなたの存在に反応するように、サーヴィターの体の何かが音を立てはじめる。数秒後には、音は鳴りやんだ。
近づくと、あなたの存在に反応するように、サーヴィターの体の何かが音を立てはじめる。その音は数秒後に鳴りやんだ。

languages.text: Al acercarte, algún elemento del cuerpo del servidor comienza a emitir un zumbido, como si detectara tu presencia. Tras unos segundos, el sonido remite.
languages.original_text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.

traits.locale_text: Al acercarte, algún elemento del cuerpo del servidor comienza a emitir un zumbido, como si detectara tu presencia. Tras unos segundos, el sonido remite.

languages.text: Sen yaklaşınca hizmetörün bedenindeki bir şey, varlığına tepki veriyormuş gibi vızıldamaya başlıyor. Birkaç saniye sonra ses alçalarak yok oluyor.
languages.original_text: As you approach, something in the servitor's body begins to hum as if in response to your presence. After a couple of seconds, the noise subsides.

traits.locale_text: Sen yaklaşınca servitörün bedenindeki bir şey, varlığına tepki veriyormuş gibi vızıldamaya başlıyor. Birkaç saniye sonra ses alçalarak yok oluyor.
